problem.markdown:
1. Performance of Laser spot hardening process is affected by ( ) Welding speed, ( ) Focal length of the beam and focusing lens ( ) Work piece position (x) All of the above
2. Which of the following conditions need to be satisfied for laser hardening? ( ) Highly accurate positioning of the components ( ) Accurate positioning of the components ( ) in the focus of the laser to prevent large variations in the irradiance (x) All of the above
3. Laser hardening can be performed using ( ) Pulsed NdYAG system ( ) Continuous wave NdYAG system ( ) Pulsed Fiber laser system (x) All of the above
4. Laser cannot effectively machine ( ) Refractory materials. ( ) WC (Tungsten carbides). (x) Copper and Aluminium ( ) Steels
5. Surface texturing can be carried out using ( ) EDM ( ) Laser machining ( ) Electro forming (x) B and C
problem.p: 1. Performance of Laser spot hardening process is affected by

choicegroup.choice: Focal length of the beam and focusing lens

problem.p: 2. Which of the following conditions need to be satisfied for laser hardening?

choicegroup.choice: Highly accurate positioning of the components
in the focus of the laser to prevent large variations in the irradiance

problem.p: 3. Laser hardening can be performed using
5. Surface texturing can be carried out using
